author: Special Correspondent
text:
A youth was killed when a speeding van ploughed through a group of devotees taking out padayatra to Tiruchendur on Tuesday night.

Police said that a group of devotees from Thuppakudi near Pappankulam were on ‘padayatra’ to Sri Subramaniya Swamy Temple in Tiruchendur.

When they were crossing Suththamalli on the city outskirts, a speeding van ploughed through the crowd, seriously injuring P. Mayandi (21) and his friends Esakki Pandi (23), Subbukutti (26), Subramanian (26) and Muppilipandi (19).

They were rushed to Tirunelveli Medical College Hospital, where Mayandi succumbed to his injuries. The condition of the others is said to be “stable”.

Suththamalli police have registered a case.
title: Devotee on padayatra killed in accident
